Data published by Schoenman, Julie A. "The concentration of health care spending." NIHCM Foundation Data Brief, National Institute of Health Care Management, Washington, DC (2012)
Data publisher's source NIHCM using data from the 2009 U.S. Medical Expenditure Panel Survey
